amendment.description: To ensure that eligibility for assistance under the Millennium Challenge Account includes a demonstrated commitment to the sustainable use of natural resources.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1171 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9173-9174; text: CR S9173) To ensure that eligibility for assistance under the Millennium Challenge Account includes a demonstrated commitment to the sustainable use of natural resources.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1171 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1136.
